TopicTitle: What mod/s will add a realistic smoke effect to my game?

Articles.Content: What mod/s will add a realistic smoke effect to my game? I'm looking for something like this. I have researched for a bit but nothing came up. Thanks for any responses.

Try SRB Waterfall Effects? It won't give you the billowing clouds on the launchpad but it does a good job for SRBs in flight, which produce most of the smoke effects on real rockets. Waterfall itself with either stock or Restock configs will give you more realistic looking liquid-fuelled engine plumes which IMO are significantly better than stock plumes.

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

are significantly better than stock plumes.

not significantly better it's sooo much better! also I looked at SRB Waterfall effects and it has a lot more dependencies than I like. My gamedata folder is already so full.
